    PackageTutorial.Rmd

    Introduction to My R Package

    In this package it includes the function of a lm plot, a ggplot, and the ability to clean the data. These function are ment to be used with the data set g=crabs that is in the R file. this acn be downloaded to your computer to use the different functions.

    ## Installation Instructions

    This package require the uses of the packages as followed.

    install.packages("tidyverse")
    ## Installing package into '/tmp/RtmpMADs6A/temp_libpath58c59c49593'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)
    install.packages("ggplot2")
    ## Installing package into '/tmp/RtmpMADs6A/temp_libpath58c59c49593'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)
    install.packages("roxygen")
    ## Installing package into '/tmp/RtmpMADs6A/temp_libpath58c59c49593'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)
    ## Warning: package 'roxygen' is not available for this version of R
## 
## A version of this package for your version of R might be available elsewhere,
## see the ideas at
## https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-patched/R-admin.html#Installing-packages
    remotes::install_github("Beaupo/freebird")
    ## Using github PAT from envvar GITHUB_PAT
    ## Downloading GitHub repo Beaupo/freebird@HEAD
    ## vctrs      (0.5.0  -> 0.5.1 ) [CRAN]
## sass       (0.4.2  -> 0.4.4 ) [CRAN]
## xfun       (0.34   -> 0.35  ) [CRAN]
## knitr      (1.40   -> 1.41  ) [CRAN]
## data.table (1.14.4 -> 1.14.6) [CRAN]
    ## Installing 5 packages: vctrs, sass, xfun, knitr, data.table
    ## Installing packages into '/tmp/RtmpMADs6A/temp_libpath58c59c49593'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)
    ## ── R CMD build ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## * checking for file ‘/tmp/RtmpBgC3WD/remotes6a3a9f85f8/Beaupo-Freebird-3a5e3cf/DESCRIPTION’ ... OK
## * preparing ‘Freebird’:
## * checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ... OK
## * excluding invalid files
## Subdirectory 'R' contains invalid file names:
##   ‘crabs.txt’
## * checking for LF line-endings in source and make files and shell scripts
## * checking for empty or unneeded directories
## * building ‘Freebird_0.0.0.9000.tar.gz’
## Warning: invalid uid value replaced by that for user 'nobody'
    ## Installing package into '/tmp/RtmpMADs6A/temp_libpath58c59c49593'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)
    download.file(url="https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/2292169",
              destfile = "data/crabs.csv")
    ## Warning in download.file(url = "https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/
## 2292169", : URL https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/2292169: cannot open
## destfile 'data/crabs.csv', reason 'No such file or directory'
    ## Warning in download.file(url = "https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/
## 2292169", : download had nonzero exit status

    crabs <- read.csv(“/cloud/project/R”)
